name: Meltdown (itch) (JaGTeK Games)
description:
The Game

It's your first day at the helm of an unstable nuclear reactor and the only way to stop it from going into a meltdown is to keep track of the many modules in its control panel. As the days progress and the reactor gets upgraded, more and more modules and tasks around the office will keep your hands full. Multi-tasking is the name of the game!

There are 3 endings to the game, 2 of which are based on what you choose later in the game while 1 is a secret ending that can be achieved at any point. Can you find them all?

We were perhaps a little over ambitious with what we felt we could do in the time-frame, as we would have loved to add more modules, office distractions and pointless tasks to make it harder. Perhaps a post-jam version is in order...

Aim of the Game

- Complete your given tasks every day.

- These include generating a power quota via the reactor, sending emails and more.

How to play

- Move the mouse to the edges of the screens to pan the camera left and right to look around the office.

- All module and office task instructions are available to read in the manual to the very far right of the office.

- Simple click on the green book in the folder to open the manual.

- Once you are ready to start the day, click on the big red power button and the reactor will kick into action.
